name: Little Lost Robot
description:
*** Little Lost Robot ***

[EN]

Graphic narrative developed for the subject of Instrumental English of the course of TADS 2017.2 - IFRN. Inspirado no conto Little Lost Robot de Isaac Asimov.

-
[PT-BR]

Narrativa gráfica desenvolvida para a matéria de Inglês Instrumental do curso de TADS 2017.2 - IFRN. Inspired by the tale Little Lost Robot by Isaac Asimov.
